card0.name: Pikachu
card0.description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

card1.name: Charizard
card1.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

card2.name: Bulbasaur
card2.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

card3.name: Squirtle
card3.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

card4.name: Caterpie
card4.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

65a3c4701624d.name: Arcanine
65a3c4701624d.description: Arcanine is a majestic and powerful Fire-type Pokémon known for its regal appearance and exceptional speed. Evolving from Growlithe, this quadrupedal creature boasts a striking blend of orange and black fur, resembling a noble and legendary beast. With a flame that burns fiercely on its back, Arcanine is often associated with the image of a guardian or mythical creature. Its impressive speed allows it to cover vast distances swiftly, making it a loyal and agile companion for trainers. Known for its loyalty and noble demeanor, Arcanine is not only a formidable battler but also a symbol of strength and honor in the Pokémon world.

65a5210c060d7.name: Maschiff
65a5210c060d7.description: It always scowls in an attempt to make opponents take it seriously, but even crying children will burst into laughter when they see Maschiff’s face.
